languages.text: {n}В воксе раздается сдавленный хрип.{/n} "Прошу простить, Ваша Светлость, кажется, мне пора вернуться в кабинет, принять капли от сердца и взяться за составление сметы расходов. Она... займет изрядное время".

{n}A stifled wheeze comes out of the vox.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I fear I must go to my study, take something for my heart, and start putting together the repair budget. It... may take considerable time."
languages.original_text: {n}В воксе раздается сдавленный хрип.{/n} "Прошу простить, Ваша Светлость, кажется, мне пора вернуться в кабинет, принять капли от сердца и взяться за составление сметы расходов. Она... займет изрядное время".

traits.locale_text: {n}A stifled wheeze comes out of the vox.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I fear I must go to my study, take my heart drops, and start putting together the repair budget. It... may take considerable time."

{n}A stifled wheeze comes out of the vox.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I fear I must go to my study, take my heart drops, and start putting together the repair budget. It... may take considerable time."

{n}A stifled wheeze comes out of the vox.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I fear I must go to my study, take my heart drops, and start putting together the repair budget. It... may take considerable time."

{n}A stifled wheeze comes out of the vox.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I fear I must go to my study, take my heart drops, and start putting together the repair budget. It... may take considerable time."

{n}A stifled wheeze comes out of the vox.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I fear I must go to my study, take something for my heart, and start putting together the repair budget. It... may take considerable time."

{n}A stifled wheeze comes out of the vox.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I fear I must go to my study, take something for my heart, and start putting together the repair budget. It... may take considerable time."

languages.text: {n}Un jadeo ahogado surge del voco.{/n} «Ruego que me disculpe, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero me temo que debo ir a mi estudio, tomarme algo para el corazón y empezar a preparar el presupuesto de las reparaciones. Puede que... me lleve un tiempo».
languages.original_text: {n}A stifled wheeze comes out of the vox.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I fear I must go to my study, take something for my heart, and start putting together the repair budget. It... may take considerable time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un jadeo ahogado surge del voco.{/n} «Ruego que me disculpe, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero me temo que debo ir a mi estudio, tomarme algo para el corazón y empezar a preparar el presupuesto de las reparaciones. Puede que... me lleve un tiempo».

languages.text: {n}音阵装置里传来了窒息般的喘息声。{/n}“请原谅，舰长大人。我恐怕得赶紧回一趟书房，吃点缓解心脏的东西，整理一下无心号的修复预算。这项工作……可能要花上很多时间。”
languages.original_text: {n}A stifled wheeze comes out of the vox.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I fear I must go to my study, take something for my heart, and start putting together the repair budget. It... may take considerable time."

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵装置里传来了窒息般的喘息声。{/n}“请原谅，舰长大人。我恐怕得赶紧回一趟书房，吃点缓解心脏的东西，整理一下无心号的修复预算。这项工作……可能要花上很多时间。”
{n}音阵装置里传来了窒息般的喘息声。{/n}“请原谅，舰长大人。我恐怕得赶紧回一趟书房，吃几颗救心丸，整理一下无心号的修复预算。这项工作……可能要花上很多时间。”

languages.text: {n}Un sifflement assourdi s'élève du vox.{/n} « Si vous voulez bien m'excuser, Votre Seigneurie, il est temps pour moi de regagner mon bureau et de prendre quelque chose pour mon cœur avant de calculer le montant des réparations à venir. J'ai bien peur que cela prenne un temps... considérable. »
languages.original_text: {n}A stifled wheeze comes out of the vox.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I fear I must go to my study, take something for my heart, and start putting together the repair budget. It... may take considerable time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sifflement assourdi s'élève du vox.{/n} « Si vous voulez bien m'excuser, Votre Seigneurie, il est temps pour moi de regagner mon bureau et de prendre quelque chose pour mon cœur avant de calculer le montant des réparations à venir. J'ai bien peur que cela prenne un temps... considérable. »

{n}Un sifflement assourdi s'élève du vox.{/n} « Si vous voulez bien m'excuser, Votre Seigneurie, il est temps pour moi de regagner mon bureau et de prendre mes gouttes pour le cœur avant de calculer le montant des réparations à venir. J'ai bien peur que cela prenne un temps... considérable. »

languages.text: {n}息の詰まった喘鳴がヴォックスから聞こえる。{/n}「もう一度お願いします。陛下、私は書斎に行って、心臓の薬を取り、修繕予算を作成する必要があります。それには、かなりの時間がかかるかもしれません」
languages.original_text: {n}A stifled wheeze comes out of the vox.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I fear I must go to my study, take something for my heart, and start putting together the repair budget. It... may take considerable time."

traits.locale_text: {n}息の詰まった喘鳴がヴォックスから聞こえる。{/n}「もう一度お願いします。陛下、私は書斎に行って、心臓の薬を取り、修繕予算を作成する必要があります。それには、かなりの時間がかかるかもしれません」
{n}息の詰まった喘鳴がヴォックスから聞こえる。{/n}「もう一度お願いします。陛下、私は書斎に行って、心臓の薬を取り、修繕予算を作成する必要があります。それには、かなりの時間がかかるかもしれません」

languages.text: {n}Vokstan boğuk bir hırıltı duyuluyor.{/n} "Affınıza sığınıyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ama çalışma odama gidip kalp ilacımı almam ve onarım bütçesini çıkarmaya başlamam gerekiyor. Bu da... Epey bir zaman alabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}A stifled wheeze comes out of the vox.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I fear I must go to my study, take something for my heart, and start putting together the repair budget. It... may take considerable time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vokstan boğuk bir hırıltı duyuluyor.{/n} "Affınıza sığınıyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ama çalışma odama gidip kalp ilacımı almam ve onarım bütçesini çıkarmaya başlamam gerekiyor. Bu da... Epey bir zaman alabilir."

{n}Vokstan boğuk bir hırıltı duyuluyor.{/n} "Affınıza sığınıyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ama çalışma odama gidip kan damlalarımı almam ve onarım bütçesini çıkarmaya başlamam gerekiyor. Bu da... Epey bir zaman alabilir."

languages.text: {n}Aus dem Vox ertönt ein ersticktes Keuchen.{/n} "Bitte entschuldigt mich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber ich fürchte, ich muss zurück in mein Arbeitszimmer, etwas für mein Herz einzunehmen und ein Budget für die Reparaturen zusammenzustellen. Das ... könnte eine Weile dauern."
languages.original_text: {n}A stifled wheeze comes out of the vox.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I fear I must go to my study, take something for my heart, and start putting together the repair budget. It... may take considerable time."
